debian_equivs_url.description: URL to download the Debian equivs file from.

installer_dir.description: Path to directory to download the installer to.

interactive.description: Start an interactive installation even when profile is provided.

logfile.description: Log all output (stdout + stderr) to this file in addition to console.

profile.description:
Path to a TeX Live installation profile file.
If not provided, an interactive installation will be performed.

reinstall.description: Same as '--install', but uninstall TeX first if already installed.

syspkg_install_script.description: Path to the system package installation script.
